txt.en: As you progress in skirmishes and take important locations, you will earn Skirmish Marks. Skirmish Marks will allow you to barter for upgrades for your Soldier, new equipment and gear, consumables, and housing and cosmetic items.

As you progress in skirmishes and take important locations, you will earn Marks. Marks will allow you to barter for upgrades for your Soldier, new equipment and gear, consumables, and housing and cosmetic items.
